Streams_APIUsing_writable_streams.summary: As a JavaScript developer, programmatically writing data to a stream is very useful! This article explains the Streams API's writable stream functionality.

blockquote.para:
Note: This article assumes that you understand the use cases of writable streams, and are aware of the high-level concepts.
If not, we suggest that you first read the Streams concepts and usage overview and dedicated Streams API concepts article, then come back.
Note: If you are looking for information about readable streams, try Using readable streams and Using readable byte streams instead.
